text.div:
GuideResourcePurpose

Why a resource is included in the guide.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/guide-resource-purpose, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
example ExampleThe resource is intended as an example.
terminology TerminologyThe resource defines a value set or concept map used in the implementation guide.
profile ProfileThe resource defines a profile (StructureDefinition) that is used in the implementation guide.
extension ExtensionThe resource defines an extension (StructureDefinition) that is used in the implementation guide.
dictionary DictionaryThe resource contains a dictionary that is part of the implementation guide.
logical Logical ModelThe resource defines a logical model (in a StructureDefinition) that is used in the implementation guide.

name: GuideResourcePurpose
description: Why a resource is included in the guide.

The resource defines a profile (StructureDefinition) that is used in the implementation guide.

The resource contains a dictionary that is part of the implementation guide.
The resource defines a logical model (in a StructureDefinition) that is used in the implementation guide.
